alert.note: Alert for Miami-Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 08 at 9:29AM EDT until further notice by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Coastal central Miami-Dade * WHEN...Until 1045 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 928 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding in areas that are experiencing drainage issues due to the astronomical high tide this morning. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Miami, Miami Beach, Coral Gables, Key Biscayne, Virginia Key, Pinecrest, Coconut Grove, Fisher Island, Downtown Miami, Marlins Park, Port Of Miami and Palmetto Bay. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
